topic.title: i have a idea of Zerome
topic.body:
three things：Rapids layer & Static layer & Blacklist


what is Rapids layer? is public message just like Zerome "everyone" tab Rapids layer is storage
everyone(you not followed) message but it's a little tiny For example eh... let's set it's 100MB
(You can make the storage settings bigger if you want)
When the Rapids layer storage is full it's will be "forget" the old data
BTW use blacklist can make everyone(normal) message not be "SPAM Buring"
("SPAM Buring" is someone always sent spam and make normal message be the old data then be"forget")


what is Static layer? is message of you followed user
but there's a new funcation is "I want to save this content permanently（If you think a piece of content makes you very interested, or it is very useful or very important you can click the "save button" then it's will be moving to Static Layer Even if you are not following the user）"


Blacklist well... if you don't like someone always SPAM on zerome
just click the“adduser to Blacklist” button
it's will make you never receive the message of SPAM user
